name: Totally Relaxing Golf
description:
Get to the fairway, and aim for the hole! Totally Relaxing Golf features 12 very relaxing holes, with very relaxing music to accompany you!

Get the ball in the hole without using up all of your shots or touching hazards such as water, [REDACTED], [REDACTED], and [REDACTED].

Click on the ball, then drag the mouse to perform a stroke. Press the escape key to return to the main menu.

Hey, there totally aren't any enemies in this game! I'll just list some enemies from a different game that is guaranteed to exist.

  • Normal Enemies - These enemies move back and forth.
  • Turret Enemies - These enemies face the player, then shoot.
  • Homing Enemies - These enemies move towards the player.

Touching any of these enemies or their projectiles will instantly kill you, and force you to restart the level.

However, that's definitely from a different game, as I mentioned earlier. Have fun!

This game was made in seven days for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2, with the theme being "Let There Be Chaos."
